result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Antwon Rashad Spruiel

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Antwon Rashad Spruiel in court.  Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court for Antwon Rashad Spruiel.  
Prosecuting attorney Katrina Voge in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
Calendar call held.  Court ordered the stayed warrant vacated.  Defendant has a felony case which is set for trial on 11/07/22.  Atty. Lamke requests a status conference after that date. Case is adjourned to Br. 1. This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Antwon Rashad Spruiel not in court.  Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court for Antwon Rashad Spruiel.  Prosecuting attorney Michael J. Odden in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for status conference.  No appearance by the defendant.  Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed until the next court date.  Case adjourned to Br. 1.
Calendar call scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Antwon Rashad Spruiel in court.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Hearing held via Zoom. HEARING HELD OFF THE RECORD. Defendant in court and waited for over two hours. Attorney Matthew Lamke not present in court. Court allowed the defendant to leave the zoom call. Next Court date selected and emailed to Attorney Lamke. Case adjourned to Br. 1.  Status conference scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 11:00 am.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Antwon Rashad Spruiel in court.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 1.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 1 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 27, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Current: 5874 N 63rd Lower, Milwaukee, WI 53218   (Effective: 07-08-2022)
Prior: 3570 North 14th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 7/8/22 @ 1:30p
